front.text: Here will lie the question. click anywhere on the card to view the answer
Which country is responsible for the largest share of U.S. exports?
Canada has ten provinces. Two have no coastline on any oceans. Alberta is one of them. Which is the other one?
What continent is Canada located in?

In what province can you find Brandon, Flin Flon, and the Polar Bear Capital of the World, Churchill?
Why is the province of Prince Edward Island nicknamed Spud Island?

back.text: Its famous for its potatoes, also known as spuds.

front.text: How many provinces are there in Canada?

back.text: 10, but if you add the territories there are 13.
